fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Send out your Pokemon at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host chooses all Pokemon you receive to benefit you the most. The host will not justify their choice.
- Instead of using a Pokemon's ability, you may choose to give yourself any attributes they have.
- Your Pokemon will trigger effects that happen to visitors, however you are Astral.
- Roleblock, Control and Modification Immune.
- Pokemon cannot evolve except by your own attributes.

- At the start of Night 1, you will receive a Pokemon (Base).
- At the start of Night 2, you will receive another Pokemon (Base).
- At the start of Night 3, you will receive a Pokemon (Single). Your first Pokemon will evolve.
- At the start of Night 4, you will receive a Pokemon (Legendary). Your second Pokemon will evolve.
- At the start of Night 5 and 6, you will receive any Pokemon.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who will oppose you.
